answers.answer: My doctor told me I could eat but not to go overboard. I would recommend no juice/soda, maple syrup or anything with a lot of sugar.I had a bowl of cereal an hour before my test and my levels were fine.
I was told to fast 4 hrs
My doctor toad me no.But that was 9 years ago.I'm a diabetic with this baby so I don't count.But you can call your doctor and find out

You should call the office to check. My first pregnancy I was told to fast and this one I was just told to watch my carbs... Doctors will look for different levels depending on whether you eat or not, so if you do opposite of what your doctor wants you may falsely fail.

I am sitting in the waiting room right now waiting to be called back to draw my blood. Still have 1ominutes left.My doctor specifically told me not to fast. She said to eat protien 2 hours before the test.I ate plain scrambled eggs and nothing else, that was her suggestion.Do NOT eat anything with sugar bc then the amount of sugar in your body will be higher and you may fail.

I did mines last week, i was told that I could eat just not any sweets. After I drank the stuff for the test I couldn't have anything but water in my mouth until I got my blood drawn. Results came back in diabetes.
My results came back and I don't have diabetes.
I ate right before . My nurse told me no sweets before. I passed the first one too
i ate before I got my test done. They asked me if I did and they didn't say anything.
How many mmonth are u before u take a glucose test

question: Can I eat bfor my glucose test later today??? Or is there anything I can snack on til then!? Its 8:45 here now and my test is at 12:45 later. Please! Gimme sum good advice! I'm hungry.
title: comments please!!!
